name: eggd_somalier_relate2multiqc_v1.0.0
title: eggd_somalier_relate2multiqc
summary: Reformats somalier output somalier.samples.tsv to append predicted sex to file and it is in a suitable format for multiqc

inputSpec.name: somalier_input
inputSpec.help: Output file from somalier, default name: somalier.samples.tsv

inputSpec.name: f
inputSpec.label: Female
inputSpec.help: A integer value for het calls threshold for females. Default is 45

inputSpec.name: m
inputSpec.label: Male
inputSpec.help: A integer value for het calls threshold for males. Default is 1

inputSpec.name: file_prefix
inputSpec.help: File with current path directory. Removes 000 prefix. Run 'dx pwd > file_prefix.txt' on the cmd line
